vocabularyDefinition.en: Spatial Sampling Object with additional characteristics relevant to the Soil and Subsoil domain.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Spatial Sampling Object with additional characteristics relevant to the Soil and Subsoil domain.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: It is about characteristics that are typical in the context of Sampling, e.g. in Boreholes, the ground level and the depth.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: It is about characteristics that are typical in the context of Sampling, e.g. in Boreholes, the ground level and the depth.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The depth of the sampling object.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The depth of the sampling object.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: This is important if the Sampling Object is, for example, a borehole and it has not been drilled perfectly vertically so that depth and length differ from each other.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: This is important if the Sampling Object is, for example, a borehole and it has not been drilled perfectly vertically so that depth and length differ from each other.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The ground level of the sampling object.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The ground level of the sampling object.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: The exact location of the ground surface is very important, e.g. in the case of a borehole, because other data are compared to it (e.g. the depth of the drilling).

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: The exact location of the ground surface is very important, e.g. in the case of a borehole, because other data are compared to it (e.g. the depth of the drilling).

vocabularyDefinition.en: The location of the sampling object.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The location of the sampling object.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: In addition to the geometry, additional indications of the location are sometimes useful, e.g. in the case of the borehole in which municipality the borehole has been drilled.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: In addition to the geometry, additional indications of the location are sometimes useful, e.g. in the case of the borehole in which municipality the borehole has been drilled.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Assigned task.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Assigned task.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: In this context, the task of carrying out Observations or Sampling.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: In this context, the task of carrying out Observations or Sampling.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Putting a hole in something by means of a drill.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Putting a hole in something by means of a drill.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: In the vocabulary Soil & Subsoil, we use this class purely as a generalization of Soil Drilling and Soil Drilling.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: In the vocabulary Soil & Subsoil, we use this class purely as a generalization of Soil Drilling and Soil Drilling.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Measurement series in which the proportion of something varies according to something else.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Measurement series in which the proportion of something varies according to something else.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: This share is referred to as a 'fraction'. Vb is the statistical distribution of education levels over the population or the distribution of grain diameters in a soil sample.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: This share is referred to as a 'fraction'. Vb is the statistical distribution of education levels over the population or the distribution of grain diameters in a soil sample.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The result of the Fraction measurement.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The result of the Fraction measurement.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The Observed Characteristic.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The Observed Characteristic.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Result of a Fraction measurement.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Result of a Fraction measurement.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: Since the Fraction Measurement is a Measurement Series, the result consists of a series of individual Measurements.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: Since the Fraction Measurement is a Measurement Series, the result consists of a series of individual Measurements.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Value of individual Measurement in the Measurement Series.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Value of individual Measurement in the Measurement Series.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Personally reasoned judgment about the meaning of something.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Personally reasoned judgment about the meaning of something.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: NOTE

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: NOTE

vocabularyDefinition.en: Layer in the soil with a certain vertical size, created by non-pedogenic processes and showing a change in structure and/or composition with upper or lower layers.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Layer in the soil with a certain vertical size, created by non-pedogenic processes and showing a change in structure and/or composition with upper or lower layers.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: Can also be a grouping of soil horizons or other sub-layers with a special purpose.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: Can also be a grouping of soil horizons or other sub-layers with a special purpose.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Spatial Sampling Object with additional characteristics relevant to the Soil and Subsoil domain.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Spatial Sampling Object with additional characteristics relevant to the Soil and Subsoil domain.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: It is about characteristics that are typical in the context of Sampling, e.g. in Boreholes, the ground level and the depth.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: It is about characteristics that are typical in the context of Sampling, e.g. in Boreholes, the ground level and the depth.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The depth of the sampling object.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The depth of the sampling object.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: This is important if the Sampling Object is, for example, a borehole and it has not been drilled perfectly vertically so that depth and length differ from each other.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The ground level of the sampling object.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: The exact location of the ground surface is very important, e.g. in the case of a borehole, because other data are compared to it (e.g. the depth of the drilling).

vocabularyUsageNote.en: In addition to the geometry, additional indications of the location are sometimes useful, e.g. in the case of the borehole in which municipality the borehole has been drilled.
